mapper.select:
SELECT count( 1 ) AS vehiclecount FROM trailer_management AS a WHERE a.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ( ${fieldName} <= #{expireDate} OR ${fieldName} IS NULL )
AND trailer_number = #{plateNumber}

SELECT count( 0 ) AS vehiclecount FROM tenant_trailer_rel AS a, trailer_management AS b WHERE a.trailer_id = b.id AND b.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ( ${fieldName} <= #{expireDate} OR ${fieldName} IS NULL )
AND b.trailer_number=#{plateNumber}

SELECT app.car_no platenumber, app.contract_mobile cardriverphone FROM service_repair_order app WHERE app.order_status = 1 AND app.work_type = 'GHCBY' AND app.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND app.car_no = #{plateNumber}

SELECT uri.vehicle_code AS vehiclecode, uri.plate_number AS platenumber FROM user_repair_info uri WHERE uri.state = 1 AND uri.app_repair_state = 3 AND uri.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND uri.plate_number = #{plateNumber}
